0.27.0.name: @opentelemetry/exporter-trace-otlp-grpc
0.27.0.description: OpenTelemetry Collector Exporter allows user to send collected traces to the OpenTelemetry Collector

scripts.postcompile: npm run submodule && npm run protos:copy
scripts.submodule: git submodule sync --recursive && git submodule update --init --recursive
scripts.precompile: lerna run version --scope $(npm pkg get name) --include-filtered-dependencies
